sections.instructions_for_agent: Start the call with a warm greeting and establish consent

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Hello [Customer Name], welcome to [Bank Name] Video KYC.
script_lines.notes: Personalize with customer name and bank name

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: This video call is live and being recorded

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: It will be used only for identity verification

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Your information will remain confidential and secure

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Are you currently present in India?

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Are you attending this call on your own, without anyone assisting or prompting you?

sections.instructions_for_agent: Ask customer to verbally confirm their details

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Kindly confirm the following details verbally:

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Your full name

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Your date of birth

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: The purpose for which you are opening/updating this account

sections.instructions_for_agent: Customer must show original PAN card and verify number

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Please hold your original PAN card in front of the camera and tilt it slightly.

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Kindly confirm the PAN number verbally.

sections.instructions_for_agent: Customer must show Aadhaar with masked number

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Please show your Aadhaar

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Kindly ensure the Aadhaar number is masked.
script_lines.notes: Check that last 4 digits or full number is masked

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Your Aadhaar will be used only for KYC purposes, as per law.

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Please blink your eyes once

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Please turn your face slightly to the left and then to the right

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Kindly smile briefly

sections.instructions_for_agent: Read address from records and confirm with customer

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: As per our records, your address is:

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: [Read address]
script_lines.notes: Agent reads the full address from customer records

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Please confirm if this is your current residential address.

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Please confirm the following:

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: You are not acting on behalf of any other person

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: The account will not be used for illegal activities

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: You are not a politically exposed person (PEP)
script_lines.expected_response: Confirmed/No, I am not a PEP

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Thank you for your cooperation.

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Your Video KYC process is now complete.

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Your account will be activated after internal verification, and you will receive confirmation via SMS or email.

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Thank you for choosing [Bank/NBFC Name].

script_lines.speaker: agent
script_lines.text: Have a great day ahead.

critical_checks.description: Not acting on behalf of others

red_flags.description: Customer refuses to show PAN card
Customer says 'No' to attending call independently
Address confirmation is refused or unclear
